name: Genomic Insights into Disease Resistance
resume: An overview of genomic patterns that influence resistance mechanisms.

name: Machine Learning in Transcriptomics
resume: A review of ML applications in gene expression analysis.
description: The study details learning algorithms used in transcriptome data analysis to uncover gene expression patterns.
title: Machine Learning in Transcriptomics

name: CRISPR-Cas9 Target Prediction Models
resume: Improving CRISPR precision with predictive modeling.
description: Research on neural network-based models that enhance target prediction accuracy for CRISPR.
title: CRISPR-Cas9 Target Prediction Models
